Check out Ladyironchef 's take on the popular dish. 

#LocalfavouriteWithCoke #CarrotCakeWithCoke #cocacolasg #sp

1.post_text:
Looking for an awesome meal experience? Don’t know where to head this weekend? For a limited time this October, we’ll be bringing you a series of absolutely IRRESISTIBLE food deals with #Coke.

Simply head down to any NTUC Fairprice, Giant, Cold Storage, Sheng Siong or Prime, and pick up a 1.5L bottle of #CocaCola (Coke / Coke light / Coke zero) with our special NECK-TAG and get up to 50% off your sumptuous delectable meals!

There are only a limited number of special bottles with neck-tags in each store so hurry down now!

Click here to find out more: http://www.coca-cola.com.sg/CokeNecktagPromo

#SumptuousMealDealswithCoke

comments.message: Thank you to all who participated in Round 1 of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest! Congratulations to Lay Yuddi Layman, we loved the shot of #ChickenRiceWithCoke which you took - definitely one of our favourite dishes to have with Coke! Kindly PM us with your contact information so we can get in touch with you. For those who didn't win this time, Round 2 is up, check our latest post for more details!

The chewiness and freshness of the fishballs and crunchiness of the wonton will make unforgettable impression. and always order coke to have unforgettable finishing.
#FishBallNoodleWithCoke #LocalfavouriteWithCoke #IceCold #Coke
I never try before to pair Chicken Rice with Coke before, and the result is awesome, you should try it. #ChickenRiceWithCoke  #LocalfavouriteWithCoke  #IceCold #Coke

#MalaXiangGuoWithCoke 
The hot new hawker craze is mala xiang guo, a fiery stirfry that are spicing up Singaporean tastebuds!

2.post_text:
Missed the first round of our #LocalfavouriteWithCoke contest? No fret! For the next 3 weeks we’ll be giving you another opportunity (or 3 to be exact), so keep your eyes peeled! 

This week, stand to win a dinner feast with 5 of your friends for up to S$500 at popular Zi Char Restaurant, New Ubin Seafood on 12 Nov '16! 

Simply like our Facebook page, share a photo and description of your favourite local food with Coke pairings in the comments below, and hashtag your picture as such, #<insertfood>WithCoke (e.g. #NasiBriyaniWithCoke)!

Here’s our take on local favourite Nasi Briyani - fragrant basmati rice layered with thick curry gravy on top of your selected ingredients. All made even better with a refreshing can of #IceCold #Coke. 

We will be selecting the most mouth-watering shot of your favourite local fare with Coke, so send in your entries now!

Contest ends 11 Oct ‘16 (6PM), T&Cs apply: http://CokeURL.com/CWF2

comments.message:
Yong Tau Foo - I noticed i kind of like picking my own favourite combination + a mixture of the chili and sweet sauce = nice comfort food. Since it may gets hot and stuffy easily at the hawker centre, a nice chilled Coke is the best! 
#LocalfavouriteWithCoke #YongTauFooWithCoke

Economy Rice or Cai Png or 菜饭 in whatever way you call it is one of my favourite localicious choice! I love the variety of many dishes you get to choose! And pair it with an iced cold refreshing Coke, only one word. SHIOK 😄👍🏼 #LocalfavouriteWithCoke #EconomyRiceWithCoke
